alert.note: Alert for Far Northeast Highlands; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 27 at 8:11PM MST until December 28 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...Sandia and Manzano Mountains including Edgewood, Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass, Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass, and Far Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...Until 4 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong cross winds on area roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Far Northeast Highlands; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood
